content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power generation facility at x=-9.5 to x=-2.5
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
- Boiler (x=-6.5, y=0.0) - currently out of fuel
- Steam engine (x=-2.5, y=0.5) - now connected to power network

### Oil production facility at x=17.5 to x=37.5
Consists of:
- Pumpjack (x=17.5, y=40.5) - now receiving electricity
- Oil refinery (x=27.5, y=40.5) - now receiving electricity, set to BasicOilProcessing recipe
- Storage tank (x=32.5, y=40.5) - contains petroleum gas
- Chemical plant (x=37.5, y=40.5) - now receiving electricity, set to PlasticBar recipe
- Wooden chest with coal (x=37.5, y=37.5)
- Inserter (x=37.5, y=38.5) - still not receiving electricity, connects chest to chemical plant

## ERROR TIPS

### Power connection issues
- Failed to connect power pole to inserter at x=37.5 y=38.5:
  - Ensure power poles are within connection range (7.5 tiles for small electric poles)
  - Verify no obstructions between power pole and inserter

### Inserter operation problems
- Inserter at x=37.5 y=38.5 has warning "output blocked by item on the ground":
  - Clear any items blocking the inserter's drop position
  - Verify chemical plant can accept items at drop position (x=37.5 y=39.5)

### Chemical plant issues
- Chemical plant at x=37.5 y=40.5 shows FLUID_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE:
  - Verify petroleum gas supply is connected and flowing
  - Check pipe connections to chemical plant's input (x=38.5 y=42.0)

### Previous errors still applicable:
- Incorrect prototype naming (PumpJack vs Pumpjack)
- Entity connection errors (set recipes before pipes)
- Fluid system issues (verify source entities have fluid)
- Fuel management (boiler at x=-6.5 y=0.0 still needs fuel)
- Entity inspection (verify inventory before inspection)
- Production verification (check EntityStatus.WORKING)
